author: jonathan
msg: Contribute Red Hat chapter on Security.

author: stsp
msg: [ Note from the future: Reverted in r1066633 ]
(svn_cl__cmd_table): On Windows, escape the caret in merge help text examples
using the ^/ URL shortcut notation. This is required by cmd.exe.
The same could be done for one example in 'svn help switch', but that
would make getopt_test 7 fail and I have no way to run tests on Windows.

author: kocolosk
msg: Make server listen on an unused port during unit tests
This prevents the tests from failing when another instance of CouchDB
is already running on the same machine.

author: tfischer
msg: better error output if parsing a control configuration fails
